Rich,
Here are a few sukashi examples:
http://tinyurl.com/294el

I've also seen some with a signaling conch motif.  I have seen one or two with some relief carving and very simple inlay.

Some of the signed plain plates have had lacquer decoration added later, not by Kunihiro.

Jim



  I've seen a lot of plain iron tsuba, mostly round occasionally
  mokko, signed Kunihiro. Never seen one with any sukashi, carving
  or inlay. Did he do anything other than plain iron?

  Thanks
  Rich S
